name: South Park Adventure
description:
Long ago. (Which was 7 months ago) There was a mystical weapon known as the Stick of Truth which was held by a noble, and handsome Wizard. Which later on the land was attacked by the Dark Elves of Zaron, which led fatal death to everyone, but later on The Stick of Truth went missing and it was up to the Wizard to find it before the Dark Elves rule the land for all eternity

Cartman's Mom: Hello Eric. Want something to eat before you play?

Cartman: Shut up Mom not now.

The wizard was ready to head out into the bloodshed world and called upon his mighty warriors into battle, and defend the Kingdom of Azoth for good.

To open inventory, press I key and press Z to select an item, and press I to exit inventory.  To use an item press X. If you die in the game, press Z to respawn at the last checkpoint.
